data.actual_result: The letters goes to the edge and then goes to the next line, making it hard to read the full name and file extension
data.expected_result: There be some padding and that the letters should go to the next line, making all the words visible to read.
data.short_description: Long title of file gets cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - Rename a file to a long name with no spaces (I tested it with a  with 55 characters excluding the file extension) - Directly upload it to a channel - Observe
